job.title: Software Engineer
job.description:
Lambda is growing! Come work at a profitable startup where we’re building powerful research computers and software for Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence experts around the world.
We're looking for Software Engineers to work across a variety of projects as we build new products and fine-tune our engineering processes, including our e-Commerce platform, internal systems for complex server manufacturing execution, and beyond. Our team is small so you'll have impact across many facets of our software development evolution.
What You’ll Do
Experience that's great to have
Example projects
Our Benefits
